titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: We walked in the Parks, and then Frank and I called on
â€“ a distressing experience. The dear fellow was in bed and seemed barely conscious of our presence. The Dean of Ch. Ch. came to lunch, & was very humorous & friendly. Then
came, & we (Frank, he, & I) walked along the towing path. We admired a fine sunset.
& his wife. Later we all walked to Christ Church, and dined with the
with his sister. A pleasant party.
